org.chrisjr.loom.mappings

Class TurtleDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chrisjr.loom.mappings.TurtleDraw

  • public class TurtleDraw
extends Object
    Classes for various drawing commands with a "turtle" that remembers the drawing state. When added to a pattern, these commands will be executed by that pattern's Turtle.
    Author:
    chrisjr

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TurtleDraw.Compound
      Combines multiple draw commands into one operation.
      static class  TurtleDraw.Forward
      Draw forward by a specified amount and move the turtle to the new location.
      static class  TurtleDraw.Move
      Move the turtle by a certain amount without drawing anything.
      static class  TurtleDraw.Pop
      Pop a stored position and heading off of the turtle's stack.
      static class  TurtleDraw.Push
      Push the current position and heading onto the turtle's stack.
      static class  TurtleDraw.Turn
      Rotate the turtle by a specified amount.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TurtleDraw()

      Creates a rotate command.
